data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Collado, Rut, Schmelz, Rüdiger M. (2002): Pristina trifida sp. nov., a new soil­dwelling microannelid (Oligochaeta: Naididae) from Amazonian forest soils, with comments on species recognition in the genus. Zootaxa 118: 1-14, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.155970
